scripts.build:client:dev: rimraf output/bundled && concurrently 'webpack --mode development --watch --progress' 'npm run docs:generate:watch'
scripts.build:client:prod: rimraf output/bundled && webpack --mode production && npm run docs:generate
scripts.docs:generate: cross-env SPEC_DUMP_FILE=openapi.json node output/compiled/server/docs/openapi.js && spectacle --target-dir output/docs --target-file docs_embeddable.html --embeddable output/openapi.json && node output/compiled/server/docs/generateDocsHtml.js
scripts.emulate:all: concurrently 'npm run emulate:imsOAuth' 'npm run emulate:registry' 'npm run emulate:providerCharacterization' 'npm run emulate:consumerCharacterization' 'npm run emulate:oneRosterServer'
scripts.productDirectory:import:local: cross-env POSTGRES_URL=postgres://localhost:8100/switchboard POSTGRES_USER=admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD=testpassword POSTGRES_SCHEMA=switchboard npm run productDirectory:import
scripts.start:local: cross-env DEBUG=express:* CONFORMANCE_TEST_CONSUMER_SERVER=http://localhost:8501 IMS_OAUTH_URL=http://localhost:8600/token IMS_OAUTH_USERNAME=test IMS_OAUTH_PASSWORD=test POSTGRES_URL=postgres://localhost:8100/switchboard POSTGRES_USER=admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD=testpassword POSTGRES_SCHEMA=switchboard node  $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION output/compiled/server/start.js
scripts.start:watch: cross-env DEBUG=express:*  CONFORMANCE_TEST_CONSUMER_SERVER=http://localhost:8501 IMS_OAUTH_URL=http://localhost:8600/token IMS_OAUTH_USERNAME=test IMS_OAUTH_PASSWORD=test POSTGRES_URL=postgres://localhost:8100/switchboard POSTGRES_USER=admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD=testpassword POSTGRES_SCHEMA=switchboard nodemon $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION --ignore sessions output/compiled/server/start.js
scripts.start:docker: docker-compose --project-directory . -f deployment/docker/docker-compose.yml -p switchboard build && docker-compose --project-directory . -f deployment/docker/docker-compose.yml -p switchboard up --abort-on-container-exit --remove-orphans
scripts.start:pte: cross-env POSTGRES_URL=postgres://localhost:8100/switchboard POSTGRES_USER=admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD=testpassword POSTGRES_SCHEMA=pte node output/compiled/pte/start
scripts.start:pte:watch: cross-env POSTGRES_URL=postgres://localhost:8100/switchboard POSTGRES_USER=admin POSTGRES_PASSWORD=testpassword POSTGRES_SCHEMA=pte nodemon --ignore sessions output/compiled/pte/start
